meanings.sent1: The word 'sim' is used as a prefix to show things are alike.
meanings.sent2: In science, 'sim' is added to words to mean they are similar.
meanings.sent3: When playing a word game, 'sim' can help you find words that look alike.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting was a sim of the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The sim between the two paintings was striking.

meanings.definition: A simulation or imitation of something
meanings.sent1: The flight sim on the computer felt so real!
meanings.sent2: The sim of the roller coaster ride was thrilling.
meanings.sent3: The sim of the haunted house made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The sim of the car race was so lifelike.
meanings.sent5: The sim of the space mission was out of this world.

meanings.definition: A type of card game involving matching pairs
meanings.sent1: Let's play a quick round of sim before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The kids enjoyed playing sim during recess.
meanings.sent3: The sim tournament at the community center was a hit.
meanings.sent4: She always wins at sim because she has a good memory.
meanings.sent5: The sim deck was beautifully illustrated.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement for electrical conductance
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the sim of the new material.
meanings.sent2: The sim of the wire determined its conductivity.
meanings.sent3: The sim of the circuit was crucial for the experiment.
meanings.sent4: The sim of the solution affected the overall performance.
meanings.sent5: The sim of the component was higher than expected.
